hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo zypper install -y gcc-c++ make tar wget
workspace_dir=`pwd`
wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.7.9/Python-2.7.9.tar.xz tar -xvf Python-2.7.9.tar.xz cd Python-2.7.9 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local make make install cd ..
# LLVM Source Code wget http://llvm.org/releases/3.7.0/llvm-3.7.0.src.tar.xz && tar xvf llvm-3.7.0.src.tar.xz
# Clang Source Code wget http://llvm.org/releases/3.7.0/cfe-3.7.0.src.tar.xz && tar xvf cfe-3.7.0.src.tar.xz
# Compiler-rt Source Code wget http://llvm.org/releases/3.7.0/compiler-rt-3.7.0.src.tar.xz && tar xvf compiler-rt-3.7.0.src.tar.xz
# Move the clang and compiler-rt to tools and projects folders of llvm respectively.
mv llvm-3.7.0.src/ llvm-3.7.0 mv cfe-3.7.0.src/ clang mv clang/ llvm-3.7.0/tools/ mv compiler-rt-3.7.0.src/ compiler-rt mv compiler-rt/ llvm-3.7.0/projects/
mkdir -p llvm-build
cd llvm-build ../llvm-3.7.0/configure --enable-optimized --enable-targets=systemz
make && make check-all
export PATH=$PATH:$workspace_dir/llvm-build/Release+Asserts/bin
touch /etc/ld.so.conf.d/llvm.conf
echo "$workspace_dir/llvm-build/Release+Asserts/lib" > /etc/ld.so.conf.d/llvm.conf
ldconfig
